bradleyross.dcm4che3.samples

Class ListClearly

  • java.lang.Object
    • bradleyross.dcm4che3.samples.ListClearly
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, EventListener

    public class ListClearly
extends Object
implements ActionListener
    Use DicomInputStream to fully read the dataset and then obtain information on the objects and elements.
    Author:
    Bradley Ross

      Interface for test on tag values to see if they are in range.

        protected void processObject(Attributes dicomObject,
                 ListClearly.TagSelector selector)
        Print the contents of a Dicom object.
        Parameters:
        dicomObject - object whose contents are to be displayed

        This method will recursively call itself to handle embedded objects.

      • processSuv

        public void processSuv(Attributes dicomObject)
        Display some of the fields used in Standardized Uptake Values.

        Current activity is in Becquerels per milliliter while the injected dose is in Becquerels.

        see ClearCanvas SUV discussion

        Highest current radiation levels on MIM data is around 8000 Becquerels per milliliter.

        See section C.8.9.2 PET Isotope Module in part 3 of the Dicom standards.

        Parameters:
        dicomObject - Dicom SOP object that will be read

      • showValue

        public void showValue(Attributes dicomObject,
             int tag)
        Write information about a tag.
        Parameters:
        dicomObject - Dicom object containing the tag
        tag - integer value of the tag to be displayed

      • run

        public void run()
        This method calls buildFrame(JPanel) to populate the user interface.

        It can be overridden to provide different capabilities.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Main driver.
        Parameters:
        args - not used
